title: Timely connections to websites AND to your "help" "solutions"
content: Every time you thrust another update/"improvement" upon my system operating Firefox becomes increasingly slower, more tempermental or just plain balky.
creator: donswenson1946

title: Picture-in-picture issues
content: I'm not sure what happened, but the picture-in-picture extension isn't working anymore and there's a sort of "script" (see uploaded image) that shows up over the top of videos, including but not limited to the ones on YouTube. I used to be able to still use the extension by using keyboard commands at first (ctrl shift ]), but now that doesn't work either.
creator: TiffanyK127

title: i cant raun any website in my mozilla browser
content: i unable to run INTIGRATED SHALA DARPAN , SSO LOG IN etc. in my browser . so please suggest solution for the problem.

title: unable to download any thing
content: unable to download any thing from any site
creator: abdalrhmansamy

title: mac fullscreen
content: Whenever I enter fullscreen (on mac) on google or safari, the video pops out of the browser into a different desktop and allows me to keep using the same browser while the video is playing in a different desktop. On firefox, when I enter fullscreen, it just puts the entire browser into a different desktop, not just the video. Is there a way to make it so it acts like google and safari?
creator: oliver.lokhandwala

title: Tab opens twice when I hold ctrl + click.
content:
Hello all,

I'm having an issue with my FF browser and opening tabs. When I hold ctrl and left click on a video, it opens the video in a new tab (which I want) but it opens the tab twice. This doesn't happen on every site I visit. I opened FF in troubleshoot (safe) mode and this issue still occurred. I thought that maybe its the mouse on my laptop but I opened Chrome and didn't have this issue at all. Is there anyway to fix this? It isn't a huge problem, just a major inconvenience that I'd rather not have to deal with. Thanks in advance.
creator: fripp89

title: Problem linking to WhatsApp Web using Firefox (v99) with Save History = No
content:
Problem linking to WhatsApp Web using Firefox (v99) with Save History = No

Hello! I have been a Firefox user for many years. I am registered with the account cso91581-firefoxsync@yahoo.es

I have a problem linking a device to WhatsApp when I use Firefox (v99) with the option "Don't remember History".

I've done a Firefox Refresh and without adding any of my add-ons, when I checked Save History = No, Firefox goes into a loop, increasing CPU usage. If I choose Save History = Yes, everything works fine.

WhatsApp is widely used in Spain (I think we are the second country in the world after Brazil). Until recently, linking the device was optional, but since a few days it has been mandatory. I use the Save History = No option, as it allows you to make all Firefox tabs private, which I find comfortable and safe.

I have tried pairing the device. During the error I have opened the console. I attach two screenshots.

I would appreciate a response from you.

Receive a cordial greeting, Osvaldo

Problema en la vinculación a WhatsApp Web utilizando Firefox (v99) con Guardar Historial = No

Hola! Soy usuario de Firefox desde hace mucho años. Estoy registrado con la cuenta cso91581-firefoxsync@yahoo.es

Tengo un problema en la vinculación de un dispositivo a WhatsApp cuando utilizo Firefox (v99) con la opción “No recordar el Historial”.

He realizado un Refresh de Firefox y, sin añadir ninguno de mis complementos, cuando he marcado Guardar Historial = No, Firefox entra en un bucle, aumentando el consumo de CPU. Si elijo Guardar Historial = Sí, todo funciona bien.

WhatsApp es muy utilizado en España (creo que somos el segundo país del mundo después de Brasil). Hasta hace poco, la vinculación del dispotivo era opcional, pero desde hace unos días es obligatoria. Utilizo la opción Guardar Historial = No, pues permite convertir todas las pestañas de Firefox en privadas, lo que me parece cómodo y seguro.

He intentado realizar la vinculación del dispositivo. Durante el error he abierto la consola. Adjunto dos pantallazos.

Agradecería una respuesta por su parte.

Reciba un cordial saludo, Osvaldo
creator: cso91581-firefoxsync
